amendment.description: Amendment sought to limit the use of protective orders and sealing of cases and settlements relating to public health or safety.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit protective orders and the sealing of records as part of the settlement of civil cases, unless the court makes a separate finding that such an order would not prevent the disclosure of information which would adversely affect public health or safety.

action.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A005) Failed by recorded vote: 177 - 242 (Roll No. 104).
